mean_cn: n.分类，归类；（动植物等的）分类学
mean_en: the act or process of putting people or things into a group or class (= of classifying them)
sentence: Please sort your garbage into different classifications.
sentence_trans: 请把垃圾分成不同的类别。
word_etyma: class类别 + ifi = fy使... + cation表名词 → classify分类 + cation表名词 → 分类法
